description: Smallest value a for Diophantine 1-doubles (a,b) ordered by smallest b.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Diophantus Property.
P. Gibbs, Diophantine quadruples and Cayley's hyperdeterminant, arXiv: 0107203 [math.NT]
prog: (PARI) an=vector(81); m=0; for(b=2,43, for(a=1,b, if(issquare(a*b+1), an[ m++ ]=a))); an
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
